name: Simple Pong (capnoill)
description:
Controls:

Player 1 - W Key to move paddle up, S Key to move paddle down.

Player 2 - Up Arrow Key to move paddle up, Down Arrow Key to move paddle down.

Made a Pong game using Godot Engine as practice for future games. Shared the source project in case anyone wants to critic my stellar project structuring. All assets and tools used in the creation of the project are listed below. 

Wood Texture Image from Free Stock Textures

Art made with Krita

Sounds made using ChipTone edited using Audacity
